name: Judgements_1
description: We see a part but fail to understand the whole. Our myopic views make us assume. Our assumptions make us judge. Our judgements make the world seem so much worse than it actually is.This is the first of a four part picture series in which Judgements_1, Judgements_2, Judgements_3 are a part of a bigger picture revealed in Judgements_4. The series is a quick reminder of resisting our judgements for what we may not understand as a part could make sense if only we knew the whole.
